page.title: 15 PIGEON FANCIERS.
page.content: We interviewed three pigeon fanciers in Shiremoor.The first man,Mr Mason said that he had been keeping pigeons for 32 years and he bred them to replace the ones that are useless.He keeps them for the fun of it and and for the prestige. He has 50 old birds and 36 young ones. He rears approximately 40 chicks a year.His pigeons mate in February and March.He feeds them twice a day and once a day in winter. He feeds them on tick beans,maize,peas,wheat and barley. The second man has 108 pigeons and he has been keeping them for 25 years but he them keeps them to race.In Shiremoor Club there are 18 members that he knows of keeps pigeons.Most of them keep and rear their birds the same as Mr Mason.
